metrics.name: Mathematical Rigor
metrics.challenge: Prove eigenvalue uniqueness, not just verification

metrics.name: Physical Consistency
metrics.evidence: Mass scale: ✓ (15.00 MeV); VEV ~ f_π: ✓ (⟨v⟩/f_π = 1.28); Vanishes at center: ✗ (|χ(0)| = 4.02e-14); GMOR compatible: ✓ (Requires coupling fit)
metrics.challenge: Derive ω₀ and v_χ from first principles, not QCD input

metrics.name: Structural Robustness
metrics.evidence: ε-stability: ✓ (max variation: 44.8%); Phase stability: ✓ (max variation: 3.8%); Geometry stability: ✓ (CoV at σ=0.05: 22.9%)
metrics.challenge: Prove structural stability under all physically relevant perturbations

metrics.name: Predictive Power
metrics.challenge: Connect predictions to specific experimental observables

challenges.description: Why must eigenvalue be exactly i? Could ∂_λχ = αiχ for α ≠ 1?
challenges.current_status: PARTIALLY ADDRESSED - follows from λ rescaling definition
challenges.mitigation: Eigenvalue fixed by λ definition; α ≠ 1 would redefine units

challenges.description: Does using ω₀ to define t = λ/ω₀ introduce circularity?
challenges.current_status: RESOLVED - ω₀ defined from E/I ratio, not time
challenges.mitigation: ω₀ = E_total/I_total uses energy and inertia, not time

challenges.description: Results depend on ε regularization; what is physical value?
challenges.potential_falsification: Show predictions change qualitatively with ε
challenges.mitigation: Physical ε determined by UV completion; qualitative features stable

challenges.description: Lattice QCD measures volume-averaged quantities; how to compare?
challenges.potential_falsification: Show volume average inconsistent with lattice results
challenges.current_status: PARTIALLY ADDRESSED - average agrees, spatial structure novel
challenges.mitigation: Volume-averaged v_χ ~ f_π matches; spatial structure is new prediction

challenges.description: 17+ theorems depend on this; failure causes cascade
challenges.potential_falsification: Find inconsistency in any downstream theorem
challenges.mitigation: Independent verification of key downstream theorems

challenges.description: Standard chiral symmetry breaking works; why prefer this?
challenges.potential_falsification: Show standard mechanism explains all observables
challenges.current_status: OPEN - CG claims additional explanatory power
challenges.mitigation: CG explains cosmological constant, mass hierarchy, chirality

challenges.description: What observable distinguishes CG from standard QFT?
challenges.potential_falsification: Show all predictions match standard theory
challenges.current_status: IDENTIFIED - position-dependent VEV is key distinction
challenges.mitigation: High-Q² form factors, gravitational wave signatures

challenges.description: Pressure diverges at vertices; physical interpretation?
challenges.mitigation: Vertices represent UV physics; regularized by ε

dependencies.cascade_risk: HIGH - Central bottleneck in mass generation chain
